titleStmt.title: A briefe introduction to geography containing a description of the grounds, and generall part thereof, very necessary for young students in that science. VVritten by that learned man, Mr William Pemble, Master of Arts, of Magdalen Hall in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Pemble, William, 1592?-1623.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Lichfield printer to the famous Vniversity for Edward Forrest,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A briefe introduction to geographie.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
